Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Oberoi_SahlHasheesh
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights beautiful hotel centre paris located close champs elysees nice clean lobby trendy bright staff helpful friendly speak english french breakfast lots cafes restaurants close walking distance definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Why rating of this hotel are so low in tripadvisor ?”
Reviews.Author: tethro
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 6nights hotel recent business trip hotel manager professional understand couple booking mine colleagues reservations complicated situation handled replied emails phones immediately appreciate location easy access foot metro looked clean overall services pretty staying paris colleague complained noisy subway running underneath didnt hear maybe depends free wifi slow little frustrated staying business hi speed internet hotels unacceptable sunday morning lady breakfast dining rude dont wrong mean customers food 22 euros attitude free customers paying bucks breakfast cant happy overall im happy chose hotel paris hard stay central paris compromise anyway im wondering ratings low

Reviews.Title: “Fine, except for manager's rudeness”
Reviews.Author: PeterCG
Reviews.Content: hotel location near st augustin walkable champs elysees smart clean huge reasonable value central paris previous reviewer found shower cubicle leaked water onto bathroom floor plumbing otherwise fine spoiling otherwise positive review managers rudeness checking informed extra tax 9 euros pay 20euro note receptionist change returning heap coins didnt wish carry round coins change mainly notes whereupon manager office looking somewhat angry insisted argument werent doing pay extra credit card manager uttering probably fortunately couldnt understand credit staff embarrassed odd behaviour polite talk try smooth matter tarnished otherwise positive experience ensured look else time manager learn staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Okay but have had too many problems”
Reviews.Author: EricPDC
Reviews.Content: ive stayed park lane times convenient location comfortable modern clean reception staff friendly separate occasions bathroom leak resulted floor constantly wet shower detached plug couldnt bath instead hotel checked especially cost hotel tv wouldnt company hotel ill checking bathroom unpack

Reviews.Title: “Indifferent staff/bait and switch”
Reviews.Author: Hassan E
Reviews.Content: despite confirmed prepaid reservation hotel offer double queen bed checked desk clerk promised solve day colleagues unable refused offer reimbursement service utterly indifferent apologetic despite nice stay prepay

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised, and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: mocha2004
Reviews.Content: am excited surprise walked clean ready 2 hours ahead schedule front desk bilingual helped plan vacation meet european standards walls little thin periodically heard guests alarming am definitely coming value money central location close proximity sites eiffel tower

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money! Discraceful service!”
Reviews.Author: grainne77
Reviews.Content: extremely expensive hotel money paris nearby due weather difficulties husband decided stay central paris getting morning regular basis extremely bad weather unable usual hotel booked hotel means standard 4star compare usual 4 star road staff extremely unfriendly agressive misunderstanding relation breakfast included meant front desk breakfast insulted husband front peacefully breakfast shameful treat own door staff requested iron board afraid touch stained dirty basically iron job ironing breakfast staff etc stay ive regretted staying ridiculous price

Reviews.Title: “A really nice hotel, and great location!”
Reviews.Author: sarahlahoud
Reviews.Content: actually stayed park lane hotel february bussiness trip honest fine stay concierge friendly welcoming clean pyjamas nicely shaped placed beds beds comfortable wifi access reviews stated otherwise close boulevard haussman galerie lafayette printemps close metro station champs elysees thank park lane ur hospitality

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: gregconlon
Reviews.Content: ideal dont spend time hotel restaurant hungry lazy arguably cleanest hotel possibly comfortable bed gentleman reception friendly welcoming ideal city break elysees 15 walk hotel rating facilities cant fault service

Reviews.Title: “Over priced...”
Reviews.Author: TE_GIRL
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel night stopover business impressions werent dazzling despite 4 star rating smart website hotel reception looked bit stark uninviting bit bank lobby staff friendly didnt appear attentive remotely providing key direction lift explanation facilities services available found actually pleasantly surprised size decor cleanliness glitches broken sink plug nice bed comfortable altogether bad stay gripe offers 4 star hotel pretty prices offers near level terms staff service facilities attention detail sadly pricey shout recommend

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good for a Parisian hotel”
Reviews.Author: PinaColada02
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotels paris surprisingly size expected american standards larger slightly paris hotels ive stayed hotel designed nicely tastefully modern style furniture arranged stayed 202 didnt feel claustrophobic bathroom pretty tile relatively spacious compared paris hotels bed soft comfortable reminded lot heavenly beds westin hotel fairly busy street dont sleep windows wasnt noisy sleep windows closed paris hotels impossible iron apparently hotel hope guest complaint free wifi real spotty able maintain strong connection lobby computer sustained internet checking channels hotel tv french english cnn international spent little time issue free breakfast nice basics youd expect free hotel breakfast location central easy city wait staff youd expect paris helpful perfunctory stayed 3 nights overall enjoyed time

Reviews.Title: “Good location. Very small rooms, average service”
Reviews.Author: sayaz
Reviews.Content: superior barely fit cotbed front desk staff friendly helpful able breakfast hotel chairs baby booster chairs reacted staff breakfast tiny underground care breakfast essentially questioning traveling baby perfectly normal accommodate children requests unreasonable checkingout expressed dissatisfaction front desk staff saying write review tripadvisor travelers service care encouraging pity brand hotel thats parisians lived paris 10
